entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
